amendment.description: Amendment requires individuals to certify that they have not been convicted of a sex offense against a minor in order to get an FHA mortgage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-503 to require individuals to certify that they have not been convicted of a sex offense against a minor in order to get an FHA mortgage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards (TX) amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 4 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Edwards (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
